subject: [Radiance-general] (no subject)
body:
Hello Greg,

Thank you for the explanation. I will try with different settings,
but I feel better now. First I though I was using rtcontrib in a
wrong way (now I realize I had tried with very low settings). Sorry
for the confusion.
Best regards,

Santiago
